thread.title: Artus Hotel is Fabulous - Review
thread.title_full: Artus Hotel is Fabulous - Review of Artus Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ChristopherMCat
title: Artus Hotel is Fabulous - Review
text: This hotel is in a perfect location. The staff is friendly. Fluent in multiple languages and always ready to help. We were visiting our daughter from USA who attends AUP and had a fabulous trip. Ask for Sonjay and staff and they will aim to please. First time to Paris and was a great place to learn the culture. We will be back.
